11const CanvasFontParameters canvas_font_params[FontTotalNumber] = {
12 [FontPrimary] = {.leading_default = 12, .leading_min = 11, .height = 8, .descender = 2},
13 [FontSecondary] = {.leading_default = 11, .leading_min = 9, .height = 7, .descender = 2},
14 [FontKeyboard] = {.leading_default = 11, .leading_min = 9, .height = 7, .descender = 2},
15 [FontBigNumbers] = {.leading_default = 18, .leading_min = 16, .height = 15, .descender = 0},
16 [FontBatteryPercent] = {.leading_default = 11, .leading_min = 9, .height = 6, .descender = 0},
17 [FontScummRomanOutline] =
18 {.leading_default = 12, .leading_min = 11, .height = 12, .descender = 2},
19 [FontScummRoman] = {.leading_default = 12, .leading_min = 11, .height = 10, .descender = 2},
20 [FontEurocorp] = {.leading_default = 12, .leading_min = 11, .height = 16, .descender = 2},
21};
22
23Canvas* canvas_init() {
24 Canvas* canvas = malloc(sizeof(Canvas));
25 canvas->compress_icon = compress_icon_alloc();
26
27 // Setup u8g2
28 u8g2_Setup_st756x_flipper(&canvas->fb, U8G2_R0, u8x8_hw_spi_stm32, u8g2_gpio_and_delay_stm32);
29 canvas->orientation = CanvasOrientationHorizontal;
30 // Initialize display
31 u8g2_InitDisplay(&canvas->fb);
32 // Wake up display
33 u8g2_SetPowerSave(&canvas->fb, 0);
34
35 // Clear buffer and send to device
36 canvas_clear(canvas);
37 canvas_commit(canvas);
38
39 return canvas;
40}
41
42void canvas_free(Canvas* canvas) {
43 furi_assert(canvas);
44 compress_icon_free(canvas->compress_icon);
45 free(canvas);
46}
47
48void canvas_reset(Canvas* canvas) {
49 furi_assert(canvas);
50
51 canvas_clear(canvas);
52
53 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
54 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
55 canvas_set_font_direction(canvas, CanvasDirectionLeftToRight);
56}
57
58void canvas_commit(Canvas* canvas) {
59 furi_assert(canvas);
60 u8g2_SendBuffer(&canvas->fb);
61}
62
63uint8_t* canvas_get_buffer(Canvas* canvas) {
64 furi_assert(canvas);
65 return u8g2_GetBufferPtr(&canvas->fb);
66}
67
68size_t canvas_get_buffer_size(const Canvas* canvas) {
69 furi_assert(canvas);
70 return u8g2_GetBufferTileWidth(&canvas->fb) * u8g2_GetBufferTileHeight(&canvas->fb) * 8;
71}
72
73void canvas_frame_set(
74 Canvas* canvas,
75 uint8_t offset_x,
76 uint8_t offset_y,
77 uint8_t width,
78 uint8_t height) {
79 furi_assert(canvas);
80 canvas->offset_x = offset_x;
81 canvas->offset_y = offset_y;
82 canvas->width = width;
83 canvas->height = height;
84}

86uint8_t canvas_width(const Canvas* canvas) {
87 furi_assert(canvas);
88 return canvas->width;
89}

91uint8_t canvas_height(const Canvas* canvas) {
92 furi_assert(canvas);
93 return canvas->height;
94}

96uint8_t canvas_current_font_height(const Canvas* canvas) {
97 furi_assert(canvas);
98 uint8_t font_height = u8g2_GetMaxCharHeight(&canvas->fb);
99
100 if(canvas->fb.font == u8g2_font_haxrcorp4089_tr) {
101 font_height += 1;
102 }
103
104 return font_height;
105}
106
107uint8_t canvas_current_font_width(const Canvas* canvas) {
108 furi_assert(canvas);
109 return (uint8_t)u8g2_GetMaxCharWidth(&canvas->fb);
110}
111
112const CanvasFontParameters* canvas_get_font_params(const Canvas* canvas, Font font) {
113 furi_assert(canvas);
114 furi_assert(font < FontTotalNumber);
115 return &canvas_font_params[font];
116}
117
118void canvas_clear(Canvas* canvas) {
119 furi_assert(canvas);
120 if(xtreme_settings.dark_mode) {
121 u8g2_FillBuffer(&canvas->fb);
122 } else {
123 u8g2_ClearBuffer(&canvas->fb);
124 }
125}
126
127void canvas_set_color(Canvas* canvas, Color color) {
128 furi_assert(canvas);
129 if(xtreme_settings.dark_mode) {
130 if(color == ColorBlack) {
131 color = ColorWhite;
132 } else if(color == ColorWhite) {
133 color = ColorBlack;
134 }
135 }
136 u8g2_SetDrawColor(&canvas->fb, color);
137}
138
139void canvas_set_font_direction(Canvas* canvas, CanvasDirection dir) {
140 furi_assert(canvas);
141 u8g2_SetFontDirection(&canvas->fb, dir);
142}
143
144void canvas_invert_color(Canvas* canvas) {
145 canvas->fb.draw_color = !canvas->fb.draw_color;
146}
147
148void canvas_set_font(Canvas* canvas, Font font) {
149 furi_assert(canvas);
150 u8g2_SetFontMode(&canvas->fb, 1);
151 switch(font) {
152 case FontPrimary:
153 u8g2_SetFont(&canvas->fb, u8g2_font_helvB08_tr);
154 break;
155 case FontSecondary:
156 u8g2_SetFont(&canvas->fb, u8g2_font_haxrcorp4089_tr);
157 break;
158 case FontKeyboard:
159 u8g2_SetFont(&canvas->fb, u8g2_font_profont11_mr);
160 break;
161 case FontBigNumbers:
162 u8g2_SetFont(&canvas->fb, u8g2_font_profont22_tn);
163 break;
164 case FontBatteryPercent:
165 u8g2_SetFont(&canvas->fb, u8g2_font_5x7_tf); //u8g2_font_micro_tr);
166 break;
167 case FontScummRomanOutline:
168 u8g2_SetFont(&canvas->fb, u8g2_font_lucasarts_scumm_subtitle_o_tr);
169 break;
170 case FontScummRoman:
171 u8g2_SetFont(&canvas->fb, u8g2_font_lucasarts_scumm_subtitle_r_tr);
172 break;
173 case FontEurocorp:
174 u8g2_SetFont(&canvas->fb, u8g2_font_eurocorp_tr);
175 break;
176 default:
177 furi_crash();
178 break;
179 }
180}
181
182void canvas_set_custom_u8g2_font(Canvas* canvas, const uint8_t* font) {
183 furi_assert(canvas);
184 u8g2_SetFontMode(&canvas->fb, 1);
185 u8g2_SetFont(&canvas->fb, font);
186}
187
188void canvas_draw_str(Canvas* canvas, uint8_t x, uint8_t y, const char* str) {
189 furi_assert(canvas);
190 if(!str) return;
191 x += canvas->offset_x;
192 y += canvas->offset_y;
193 u8g2_DrawStr(&canvas->fb, x, y, str);
194}
195
196void canvas_draw_str_aligned(
197 Canvas* canvas,
198 uint8_t x,
199 uint8_t y,
200 Align horizontal,
201 Align vertical,
202 const char* str) {
203 furi_assert(canvas);
204 if(!str) return;
205 x += canvas->offset_x;
206 y += canvas->offset_y;
207
208 switch(horizontal) {
209 case AlignLeft:
210 break;
211 case AlignRight:
212 x -= u8g2_GetStrWidth(&canvas->fb, str);
213 break;
214 case AlignCenter:
215 x -= (u8g2_GetStrWidth(&canvas->fb, str) / 2);
216 break;
217 default:
218 furi_crash();
219 break;
220 }
221
222 switch(vertical) {
223 case AlignTop:
224 y += u8g2_GetAscent(&canvas->fb);
225 break;
226 case AlignBottom:
227 break;
228 case AlignCenter:
229 y += (u8g2_GetAscent(&canvas->fb) / 2);
230 break;
231 default:
232 furi_crash();
233 break;
234 }
235
236 u8g2_DrawStr(&canvas->fb, x, y, str);
237}
238
239uint16_t canvas_string_width(Canvas* canvas, const char* str) {
240 furi_assert(canvas);
241 if(!str) return 0;
242 return u8g2_GetStrWidth(&canvas->fb, str);
243}

245uint8_t canvas_glyph_width(Canvas* canvas, char symbol) {

248}

250void canvas_draw_bitmap(
251 Canvas* canvas,
252 uint8_t x,
253 uint8_t y,
254 uint8_t width,
255 uint8_t height,
256 const uint8_t* compressed_bitmap_data) {
257 furi_assert(canvas);
258
259 x += canvas->offset_x;
260 y += canvas->offset_y;
261 uint8_t* bitmap_data = NULL;
262 compress_icon_decode(canvas->compress_icon, compressed_bitmap_data, &bitmap_data);
263 canvas_draw_u8g2_bitmap(&canvas->fb, x, y, width, height, bitmap_data, IconRotation0);
264}
265
266void canvas_draw_icon_animation(
267 Canvas* canvas,
268 uint8_t x,
269 uint8_t y,
270 IconAnimation* icon_animation) {
271 furi_assert(canvas);
272 furi_assert(icon_animation);
273
274 x += canvas->offset_x;
275 y += canvas->offset_y;
276 uint8_t* icon_data = NULL;
277 compress_icon_decode(
278 canvas->compress_icon, icon_animation_get_data(icon_animation), &icon_data);
279 canvas_draw_u8g2_bitmap(
280 &canvas->fb,
281 x,
282 y,
283 icon_animation_get_width(icon_animation),
284 icon_animation_get_height(icon_animation),
285 icon_data,
286 IconRotation0);
287}
288
289static void canvas_draw_u8g2_bitmap_int(
290 u8g2_t* u8g2,
291 u8g2_uint_t x,
292 u8g2_uint_t y,
293 u8g2_uint_t w,
294 u8g2_uint_t h,
295 bool mirror,
296 bool rotation,
297 const uint8_t* bitmap) {
298 u8g2_uint_t blen;
299 blen = w;
300 blen += 7;
301 blen >>= 3;
302
303 if(rotation && !mirror) {
304 x += w + 1;
305 } else if(mirror && !rotation) {
306 y += h - 1;
307 }
308
309 while(h > 0) {
310 const uint8_t* b = bitmap;
311 uint16_t len = w;
312 uint16_t x0 = x;
313 uint16_t y0 = y;
314 uint8_t mask;
315 uint8_t color = u8g2->draw_color;
316 uint8_t ncolor = (color == 0 ? 1 : 0);
317 mask = 1;
318
319 while(len > 0) {
320 if(u8x8_pgm_read(b) & mask) {
321 u8g2->draw_color = color;
322 u8g2_DrawHVLine(u8g2, x0, y0, 1, 0);
323 } else if(u8g2->bitmap_transparency == 0) {
324 u8g2->draw_color = ncolor;
325 u8g2_DrawHVLine(u8g2, x0, y0, 1, 0);
326 }
327
328 if(rotation) {
329 y0++;
330 } else {
331 x0++;
332 }
333
334 mask <<= 1;
335 if(mask == 0) {
336 mask = 1;
337 b++;
338 }
339 len--;
340 }
341
342 u8g2->draw_color = color;
343 bitmap += blen;
344
345 if(mirror) {
346 if(rotation) {
347 x++;
348 } else {
349 y--;
350 }
351 } else {
352 if(rotation) {
353 x--;
354 } else {
355 y++;
356 }
357 }
358 h--;
359 }
360}
361
362void canvas_draw_u8g2_bitmap(
363 u8g2_t* u8g2,
364 u8g2_uint_t x,
365 u8g2_uint_t y,
366 u8g2_uint_t w,
367 u8g2_uint_t h,
368 const uint8_t* bitmap,
369 IconRotation rotation) {
370 u8g2_uint_t blen;
371 blen = w;
372 blen += 7;
373 blen >>= 3;
374#ifdef U8G2_WITH_INTERSECTION
375 if(u8g2_IsIntersection(u8g2, x, y, x + w, y + h) == 0) return;
376#endif /* U8G2_WITH_INTERSECTION */
377
378 switch(rotation) {
379 case IconRotation0:
380 canvas_draw_u8g2_bitmap_int(u8g2, x, y, w, h, 0, 0, bitmap);
381 break;
382 case IconRotation90:
383 canvas_draw_u8g2_bitmap_int(u8g2, x, y, w, h, 0, 1, bitmap);
384 break;
385 case IconRotation180:
386 canvas_draw_u8g2_bitmap_int(u8g2, x, y, w, h, 1, 0, bitmap);
387 break;
388 case IconRotation270:
389 canvas_draw_u8g2_bitmap_int(u8g2, x, y, w, h, 1, 1, bitmap);
390 break;
391 default:
392 break;
393 }
394}
395
396void canvas_draw_icon_ex(
397 Canvas* canvas,
398 uint8_t x,
399 uint8_t y,
400 const Icon* icon,
401 IconRotation rotation) {
402 furi_assert(canvas);
403 furi_assert(icon);
404
405 x += canvas->offset_x;
406 y += canvas->offset_y;
407 uint8_t* icon_data = NULL;
408 compress_icon_decode(canvas->compress_icon, icon_get_data(icon), &icon_data);
409 canvas_draw_u8g2_bitmap(
410 &canvas->fb, x, y, icon_get_width(icon), icon_get_height(icon), icon_data, rotation);
411}

495void canvas_draw_triangle(
496 Canvas* canvas,
497 uint8_t x,
498 uint8_t y,
499 uint8_t base,
500 uint8_t height,
501 CanvasDirection dir) {
502 furi_assert(canvas);
503 if(dir == CanvasDirectionBottomToTop) {
504 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x - base / 2, y, x + base / 2, y);
505 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x - base / 2, y, x, y - height + 1);
506 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x, y - height + 1, x + base / 2, y);
507 } else if(dir == CanvasDirectionTopToBottom) {
508 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x - base / 2, y, x + base / 2, y);
509 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x - base / 2, y, x, y + height - 1);
510 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x, y + height - 1, x + base / 2, y);
511 } else if(dir == CanvasDirectionRightToLeft) {
512 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x, y - base / 2, x, y + base / 2);
513 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x, y - base / 2, x - height + 1, y);
514 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x - height + 1, y, x, y + base / 2);
515 } else if(dir == CanvasDirectionLeftToRight) {
516 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x, y - base / 2, x, y + base / 2);
517 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x, y - base / 2, x + height - 1, y);
518 canvas_draw_line(canvas, x + height - 1, y, x, y + base / 2);
519 }
520}

562
563void canvas_set_orientation(Canvas* canvas, CanvasOrientation orientation) {
564 furi_assert(canvas);
565 const u8g2_cb_t* rotate_cb = NULL;
566 bool need_swap = false;
567 if(canvas->orientation != orientation) {
568 switch(orientation) {
569 case CanvasOrientationHorizontal:
570 need_swap = canvas->orientation == CanvasOrientationVertical ||
571 canvas->orientation == CanvasOrientationVerticalFlip;
572 rotate_cb = U8G2_R0;
573 break;
574 case CanvasOrientationHorizontalFlip:
575 need_swap = canvas->orientation == CanvasOrientationVertical ||
576 canvas->orientation == CanvasOrientationVerticalFlip;
577 rotate_cb = U8G2_R2;
578 break;
579 case CanvasOrientationVertical:
580 need_swap = canvas->orientation == CanvasOrientationHorizontal ||
581 canvas->orientation == CanvasOrientationHorizontalFlip;
582 rotate_cb = U8G2_R3;
583 break;
584 case CanvasOrientationVerticalFlip:
585 need_swap = canvas->orientation == CanvasOrientationHorizontal ||
586 canvas->orientation == CanvasOrientationHorizontalFlip;
587 rotate_cb = U8G2_R1;
588 break;
589 default:
590 furi_crash();
591 }
592
593 if(need_swap) FURI_SWAP(canvas->width, canvas->height);
594 u8g2_SetDisplayRotation(&canvas->fb, rotate_cb);
595 canvas->orientation = orientation;
596 }
597}
598
599CanvasOrientation canvas_get_orientation(const Canvas* canvas) {
600 return canvas->orientation;
601}
